_header: Learn thou unkind man to be kind
_description: Have Pity on Christ — four monorhyming lines, each ending in the same word, in an English tract on Penance

CULIi12.Transcription:
Leerne þou vnkynde man to be kyndeof a beest þat haþ
                    no skille of kyndehou þou doist schame to þi kyndebut
                    þou to ihesu crist be kynde
